attributes.action: Make all secondary schools provide lockers for students, so they do not have to lug great heavy bags, text books, coats and P.E kits around all day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At our secondary school there are no locker, or cloak room facilities, making students drag around very heavy bags etc, we do not even wear coats when it is raining/snowing as we would have to carry them around with us all day dripping wet, i have been sent home from school with backache,  this is surely a health and safety matter, and would be solved by building a sheltered area with lockers for students to use and lower some of this weight we have on our backs.
